data.text: @JennaLynchNZ And infectious 2 days prior to symptoms … what was he doing then ?

@NICK_OFF_NOW @JennaLynchNZ @caffeine_addict Yes it actually was the premise Nick. Twitter is not a great forum to expand on points but by asking me we have. 😀

I wish any one who has COVID-19 a full recovery. However, having had the equivalent of Long COVID and studied the impact of past pandemics, I am concerned.

@macilree @JennaLynchNZ @caffeine_addict That wasn't the premise of your tweet...

But glad you agree that the current lack of confidence you have in the testing regime is on Labour...
@JennaLynchNZ Oh thanks Jenna. Not going add your opinion or a little scoff???

@NICK_OFF_NOW @JennaLynchNZ @caffeine_addict That having moved from PCRs to RATs, it is more likely that those who test positive may not in fact have COVID-19.

Having said that, National seems to have been advocating this less reliable testing method for quite some months.

@macilree @JennaLynchNZ @caffeine_addict The same as anyone else?

What point are you trying to make..?
@JennaLynchNZ @caffeine_addict What chance the test result is a false positive?

@JennaLynchNZ Crikey.
And leaves me wondering about how "Govt has not ordered enough RATs"  relates to "no symptoms but i have been testing myself regularly" (despite not meeting any guidelines)
